feed.title: Track Awesome Kde Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome apps, extensions, modules, themes and tools for the KDE Desktop Environment.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Jan 08, 2025
entry.content:
Plasma desktop / Scripts

  • KrÃ¶hnkite (â­868) - A dynamic tiling extension for KWin.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Jan 06, 2025
entry.content:
Office & Productivity

  • Kraft - Kraft simplifies to handle documents like invoices in your small business.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Jun 10, 2024
entry.content:
Utilities & Tools

  • KDE Wallet Manager - Manage the passwords on KDE systems. The KDE wallet subsystem allows access and password management of every application that integrates with the KDE wallet ğŸ“Œ.

Development & Programming

  • Umbrello - UML Modeller is a Unified Modelling Language (UML) diagram program based on KDE Technology ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / KCM Modules and Systems

  • kcm-wacomtablet - KDE GUI for the Wacom Linux Drivers ğŸ“Œ.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Jun 01, 2024
entry.content:
Plasma desktop / Extensions

  • Karousel (â­514) - KWin tiling script with scrolling. Works especially well with ultrawide screens.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Mar 27, 2024
entry.content:
Internet & Networking

  • NeoChat - Matrix network client for KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • Tokodon - Tokodon is a Mastodon client. It allows you to interact with the Fediverse community ğŸ“Œ.

Office & Productivity

  • GhostWriter - No distraction markdown editor ğŸ“Œ.

Utilities & Tools

  • QOwnNotes - Note taking app with cloud integration, web and mobile support.

Development & Programming

  • Kate - Kate is a Feature-Packed Code Editor with advanced support for LSP, Syntax Highlighting, multi-cursoe and more ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / Extensions

  • Bismuth (â­2.4k) - A KDE Plasma extension that lets you tile windows automatically and manage them via keyboard, just like in classical tiling window managers (i3, dwm or XMondad). (NOTE for KDE Plasma 6, check Polonium listed below)
  • Polonium - The successor of Bismuth for KDE Plasma 6.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Nov 04, 2021
entry.content:
Internet & Networking

  • Akregator - Enables you to follow news sites, blogs and other RSS/Atom-enabled websites ğŸ“Œ.
  • GSConnect - A complete implementation of KDE Connect especially for GNOME Shell with Nautilus, Chrome and Firefox integration.
  • KDE Connect - A project to communicate across all your devices: receive your phone notifications on your desktop computer, control your desktop from your phone, etc ğŸ“Œ.
  • KGet - A versatile and user-friendly download manager ğŸ“Œ.
  • KMail - KMail is the email component of Kontact, the integrated personal information manager from KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • Konqueror - Uses the KHTML rendering engine (and optionally Webkit) so it supports the latest web standards such as HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, and others ğŸ“Œ.
  • Konversation - A user-friendly Internet Relay Chat (IRC) client built on the KDE Platform ğŸ“Œ.
  • KRDC - A client application that allows you to view or control a desktop session on another machine that is running a compatible server (VNC & RDP) ğŸ“Œ.
  • KTorrent - A BitTorrent application which allows you to download files using the BitTorrent protocol ğŸ“Œ.
  • Otter Browser - Otter Browser aims to recreate the best aspects of the classic Opera (12.x) UI using Qt5.
  • Plasma-browser-integration - A suite of new features which make Firefox, Chrome and Chromium-based browsers work with your desktop ğŸ“Œ.
  • qBittorrent - An advanced BitTorrent client programmed in C++, based on Qt toolkit and libtorrent-rasterbar.
  • Qt WebBrowser - Qt WebBrowser is a browser for embedded devices developed using the capabilities of Qt and Qt WebEngine.

Graphics & Imaging

  • digiKam - Professional Photo Management with the Power of Open Source ğŸ“Œ.
  • Gwenview - A fast and easy to use image viewer by KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • KColorChooser - A simple application to select the color from the screen or from a pallete ğŸ“Œ.
  • KolourPaint - A simple painting program to quickly create raster images. It is useful as a touch-up tool and simple image editing tasks ğŸ“Œ.
  • Krita - Painting tool designed for concept artists, illustrators, matte and texture artists, and the VFX industry ğŸ“Œ.
  • Okular - A universal document viewer ğŸ“Œ.
  • Spectacle - An application for capturing desktop screenshots ğŸ“Œ.

Multimedia

  • Elisa - A music player developed by the KDE community that strives to be simple and nice to use ğŸ“Œ.
  • Haruna - Open source video player built with Qt/QML and libmpv ğŸ“Œ.
  • Kdenlive - A non-linear video editor for Linux using the MLT video framework.
  • KMix - A sound channel mixer and volume control ğŸ“Œ.
  • KWave - A sound editor built on the KDE Frameworks 5 ğŸ“Œ.
  • SMPlayer - Media player with built-in codecs that can play virtually all video and audio formats.
  • VLC - A free and open source cross-platform multimedia player and framework that plays most multimedia files, and various streaming protocols.

Office & Productivity

  • Kate - A multi-document, multi-view text editor by KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • Kronometer A stopwatch application for KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • KWrite - A text editor by KDE, based on the KDE Frameworks editor component ğŸ“Œ.
  • RSI Break - RSIBreak can be used to remind you to take a break now and then ğŸ“Œ.

System Administration

  • Discover - Intended for users and distros where the terminal isn't the optimal solution for installation of apps and add-ons or updates ğŸ“Œ.
  • Dolphin - File manager included in the KDE desktop ğŸ“Œ.
  • KDiskFree - Displays the available file devices (hard drive partitions, drives, etc.) along with information on their capacity, free space, type and mount point ğŸ“Œ.
  • Konsole - Terminal emulator included in the KDE desktop ğŸ“Œ.
  • Krusader - An advanced twin panel (commander style) file manager for KDE ğŸ“Œ.
  • KSystemLog - A system log viewer tool ğŸ“Œ.
  • Kup - A backup scheduler for KDE's Plasma desktop ğŸ“Œ.
  • Sweeper - Sweeper helps to clean unwanted traces the user leaves on the system and to regain disk space removing unused temporary files ğŸ“Œ.
  • Yakuake - A drop-down terminal emulator based on KDE's Konsole technology ğŸ“Œ.

Utilities & Tools

  • Android File Transfer - Reliable MTP client with minimalistic UI.
  • Ark - Archiving Tool ğŸ“Œ.
  • fancontrol-gui (â­349) - GUI for fancontrol which is part of lm_sensors.
  • KFind - A standalone search tool, launched by KRunner or from your menu. It is also integrated into Konqueror as "Find File" in the "Tools" menu ğŸ“Œ.
  • KRename - A utility to rename multiple files ğŸ“Œ.
  • QtPass - A multi-platform GUI for pass.
  • Yin-Yang (â­677) - Auto Night-mode for Linux.

Development & Programming

  • Kompare - A diff/patch frontend ğŸ“Œ.
  • Okteta - Hex Editor ğŸ“Œ.

Education

  • KTurtle - An educational programming environment that aims to make learning how to program as easy as possible ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / Extensions

  • Dynamic Wallpaper Engine (â­357) - A wallpaper plugin that continuously updates the desktop background based on the current time in your location.
  • Kvantum (â­1.7k) - An SVG-based theme engine for Qt4/Qt5, KDE and LXQt, with an emphasis on elegance, usability and practicality.
  • Latte-Dock - Latte is a dock based on Plasma frameworks that provides an elegant and intuitive experience for your tasks and plasmoids ğŸ“Œ.
  • Window Title Applet (â­247) - Plasma 5 applet that shows the current window title and icon in your panels.

Plasma desktop / KCM Modules and Systems

  • kde-gtk-config - GTK2 and GTK3 Configurator for KDE ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / Themes

  • ChromeOS (â­174) - A materia Design theme for KDE Plasma desktop.
  • Fluent (â­204) - A Microsoft inspired fluent Design theme for the KDE Plasma desktop.
  • Helium - A translucent theme for Plasma 5.
  • Hello (â­218) - A compilation of various color-schemes, themes, icons and more for the KDE Plasma desktop. It is unopinionated, putting you in charge.
  • Materia KDE (â­642) - A port of the popular GTK theme Materia for Plasma 5 desktop with a few additions and extras.
  • McMojave (â­251) - A MacOSX Mojave like theme for KDE Plasma desktop.
  • Orchis (â­263) - A materia Design theme for KDE Plasma desktop.
  • Qogir (â­186) - A flat design theme for KDE Plasma desktop.
  • WhiteSur (â­1k) - A MacOS Big Sur theme for KDE Plasma.

Plasma desktop / Qt and GTK+ Applications Appearance

  • Akava-Kv (â­194) - User oriented Kvantum theme for KDE.
  • Chrome-KDE5BreezeDark (â­23) - A theme for Chrome on KDE5 when using the Breeze Dark window decoration.
  • KDE-Rounded-Corners (â­167) - Rounds the corners of your windows.
  • SierraBreeze (â­353) - OSX-like window decoration for KDE Plasma written in C++.

Plasma desktop / Icons

  • Candy (â­1.2k) - Sweet gradient icons.
  • Flatery (â­320) - Icon theme for Linux in flat style.
  • Papirus (â­7.2k) - Material icon theme, initially based on Paper.
  • Zafiro (â­446) - Minimalist icons created with the flat-desing technique, utilizing washed out colors and always accompanied by white. The priority is simplicity.

Plasma desktop / Scripts

  • kwin-tiling (â­1.1k) - Tiling script for kwin.

Documentation and Resources / Display Manager

  • KDE Invent - Discover KDE projects, groups and snippets ğŸ“Œ.
  • KDE Bugtracker - KDE's official Bugtracker ğŸ“Œ.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Feb 16, 2021
entry.content:
Internet & Networking

  • Falkon - QtWebEngine based cross-platform web browser ğŸ“Œ.
  • Smb4K - Advanced Network Neighborhood Browser and Samba Share Mounting Utility ğŸ“Œ.

System Administration

  • KInfoCenter - A utility that provides detailed information about a computer system ğŸ“Œ.

Utilities & Tools

  • KWinFT - Wayland compositor and X11 window manager.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Nov 10, 2020
entry.content:

  • KDE Configs (â­925) - List of KDE configuration files and more.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Jan 26, 2020
entry.content:
Utilities & Tools

  • Wacom GUI (â­139) - Python/PyQt Wacom GUI for KDE.

Education

  • LabPlot - Interactive graphing and analysis of scientific data ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / Extensions

  • Hoppla (â­67) - KDE Plasma desktop widget to control Philips Hue lights.
  • Places Widget (â­13) - Plasma 5 widget that gives access to user places.
  • Window AppMenu Applet (â­423) - Plasma 5 applet in order to show the window appmenu.

Plasma desktop / Themes

  • Canta (â­78) - A flat design theme for KDE Plasma desktop.
  • Darkine KDE (â­45) - Theme for KDE Plasma 5 desktop, SDDM and more.
  • Layan (â­432) - A flat design theme for KDE Plasma desktop.

Plasma desktop / Qt and GTK+ Applications Appearance

  • Breeze10 (â­102) - A Windows 10 style windows decoration for KDE Plasma.
  • BreezeBlurred (â­201) - A fork of KDE Breeze window decoration written in Qt C++.
  • BreezeEnhanced (â­179) - A fork of KDE Breeze decoration with additional options.
  • Sweet KDE (â­226) - A dark and modern theme for KDE plasma.
  • XBoomer (â­91) - XP Window Decorations for KDE Plasma.

Plasma desktop / Icons

  • La Capitaine (â­2k) - Icon pack with inspiration taken from the latest iterations of macOS and Google's Material Design.
  • Tela (â­1.7k) - A flat colorful Design icon theme.

Plasma desktop / Scripts

  • Grid-Tiling-Kwin (â­913) - A kwin script that automatically tiles windows.

Plasma desktop / Display Manager

  • Chili (â­215) - The hottest login theme around for KDE Plasma 5.
  • Delicious (â­109) - A delicious SDDM theme for DE collectors/addicts.
  • Sugar Candy - The sweetest login theme available for the SDDM display manager.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Nov 16, 2019
entry.content:
Utilities & Tools

  • KWin-lowlatency (â­367) - An attempt to reduce latency and stuttering in the popular KWin compositor used in KDE.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Feb 26, 2019
entry.content:
Internet & Networking

  • KNetworkManager - A KDE client for the back end NetworkManager software ğŸ“Œ.

Multimedia

  • Amarok - Amarok is a powerful music player for Linux, Unix and Windows with an intuitive interface ğŸ“Œ.

Office & Productivity

  • Calligra - Includes efficient and capable office components ğŸ“Œ.

Development & Programming

  • KDevelop - A cross-platform IDE for C, C++, Python, QML/JavaScript and PHP ğŸ“Œ.

Plasma desktop / KCM Modules and Systems

  • kded_rotation (â­64) - A small, hacky KDED module for handling automatic screen rotation on tablets and hybrid laptops.

Plasma desktop / Qt and GTK+ Applications Appearance

  • breeze-gtk (â­78) - A GTK Theme Built to Match KDE's Breeze ğŸ“Œ.

Documentation and Resources / Display Manager

  • KDE Wikis - The KDE wikis are a source of information and documentation for the KDE desktop, applications, teams, events and more ğŸ“Œ.

Articles / Display Manager

  • KDE.news - The official KDE news website ğŸ“Œ.
  • Planet KDE - Blogs of KDE contributors ğŸ“Œ.

Communities / Display Manager

  • KDE Store - Official KDE Store for developers to share Plasma customizations ğŸ“Œ.

entry.title: Awesome Kde Updates on Mar 21, 2018
entry.content:
Plasma desktop / Themes

  • Adapta KDE (â­465) - A port of the popular GTK theme Adapta for Plasma 5 desktop with a few additions and extras.
  • Arc KDE (â­926) - A port of the popular GTK theme Arc for Plasma 5 desktop with a few additions and extras.
